name: REDEMPTION (itch) (GAMEINC20)
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/sNgrjEvEqivixfej8

Victor was an actor of the famous sci-fi movie called “Redemption”. It was his last movie he decided to played on before he stopped his career as actor. After a weird incident, he found himself in a world of his own movie, and have to fight against the system that put him where he is. Don’t even know what’s happening , all he had to do is slash his way through the system, and get out from this world. #slashemall
